title: Monkey Maya
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Beer/Wine, Asian, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Serves some vegan dishes such as scrambled tofu for breakfast and a vegan delight (a baguette filled with grilled vegetables and lettuce with a garlic and lime dressing). Also has a changing specials' board with a few vegan choices. All Asian dishes can be made vegan, plus tofu is available. The kitchen has separate chopping boards and cooking utensils for vegan food. Gluten free available. It has been suggested if you are arriving at night that you should plan to stay overnight because they are located on the coast in the jungle.
